page.title: 08Coleshill-parish church.
page.content: The church has a lot of different activities for the young,the youth club is the main attraction which is held on Wednesday at 7.30pm.In the winter the meetings are in the town hall and in the summer on the croft.The"church" often goes on walks, outings and visiting places.In the actual church there are two main activities that the young can be involved in,the choir which is growing and the bell ringers which quite a few children enjoy.The ringers for a wedding get Â£2.00 each.All of the churches in Coleshill come together occasionally and the young meet new people and make new friends within the churches.There is a Sunday school which meets every Sunday morning in the town hall,they come to church every first Sunday in the month,that is when we all have coffee afterwards.
